Questions.Question: Which of the following is the correct definition of a grill?
PossibleAnswers: A metal framework used for cooking food over an open fire.
A device for recording visual images in the form of photographs, film, or video signals.
A wipeable board with a white surface used for teaching or presentations.
The star around which the earth orbits.

Questions.Question: A smoker is a type of grill.
The most popular utensil among grill owners is a long-handled spatula.
In 2009, competitive eating champion Joey Chestnut ate __ hot dogs with buns in 10 minutes!
